meanings.sent1: Playing with my dog is the funnest activity.
meanings.sent2: The amusement park is the funnest place to visit.
meanings.sent3: The funnest part of the movie was when the characters danced.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the funnest melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The funnest memory from my childhood is building sandcastles at the beach.

meanings.sent1: The funnest game to play is charades.
meanings.sent2: Watching comedy shows is the funnest way to relax.
meanings.sent3: It was the funnest surprise party I had ever attended.
meanings.sent4: The funnest journey is the one filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent5: The funnest book I've read is a hilarious comedy about friendship.
